trans-unit.source: Defines constants that represent the ways a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> can be drawn.

This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to indicate whether the nodes or node-labels of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> are owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉型別由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，指出是否節點標籤的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>為主控描繪。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode?displayProperty=nameWithType> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to customize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control using its owner-draw capability.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制使用其主控描繪功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制項在範例中顯示的標準節點標籤旁邊的選擇性節點標籤。

trans-unit.source: Node tags are specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Tag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制項也會使用自訂色彩，包括自訂的醒目提示色彩。

trans-unit.source: You can customize most of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以自訂的大部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>色彩設定色彩屬性，但不提供為屬性選取項目醒目提示色彩。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label.
trans-unit.target: 此外，預設選取項目反白顯示矩形會擴充只周圍節點標籤。

trans-unit.source: Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag.
trans-unit.target: 主控描繪必須用於繪製節點標記，並繪製自訂反白顯示矩形大，足以包含節點標籤。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode?displayProperty=nameWithType> reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 完整的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode?displayProperty=nameWithType>參考主題。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> is drawn by the operating system.
All elements of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> node are drawn manually, including icons, checkboxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes.
The label portion of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> nodes are drawn manually.
Other node elements are drawn by the operating system, including icons, checkboxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes.
